Question: In the late spring this person and Pauline traveled to Kansas City, where their son Patrick was born on June 28, 1928.
Hints: This person produced most of his work between the mid-1920s and the mid-1950s, and won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1954.
They split their possessions while Hadley accepted this person's offer of the proceeds from The Sun Also Rises.
In the spring of 1939, this person crossed to Cuba in his boat to live in the Hotel Ambos Mundos in Havana.
